gateway:CustomWebHook.label: Custom Webhook
gateway:CustomWebHook.description: Instant trigger via incoming HTTP request. Hook value should use __WEBHOOK_ID__ placeholder.
gateway:CustomWebHook.notes: Webhook name goes in trigger.webhook.name. Data structure defines expected incoming payload.

builtin:BasicRouter.label: Router
builtin:BasicRouter.description: Routes bundles to different paths based on filter conditions. Must have at least 2 outgoing connections.
builtin:BasicRouter.notes: In Make blueprint, becomes a module with routes array. Filters live on outgoing connections.

builtin:BasicIterator.label: Iterator
builtin:BasicIterator.description: Takes an array and emits one bundle per element.
builtin:BasicIterator.notes: The array mapper field references the array to iterate over.

builtin:BasicAggregator.label: Aggregator
builtin:BasicAggregator.description: Combines multiple bundles into one. Feeder param references the source module ID.
builtin:BasicAggregator.notes: Feeder value should be an integer module ID referencing the upstream bundle source.

http:ActionSendData.label: HTTP Make a Request
http:ActionSendData.description: General-purpose HTTP request module. Supports GET, POST, PUT, PATCH, DELETE.
http:ActionSendData.notes: bodyType options: raw, x_www_form_urlencoded, multipart_form_data. Set handleErrors to true to capture HTTP error responses.

http:ActionGetFile.label: HTTP Get a File
http:ActionGetFile.description: Downloads a file from a URL.
http:ActionGetFile.notes: Returns binary data. Typically followed by a module that processes the file.

json:ParseJSON.label: Parse JSON
json:ParseJSON.description: Parses a JSON string into structured data.
json:ParseJSON.notes: Optional data_structure parameter for typed output schema.

json:TransformToJSON.label: Create JSON
json:TransformToJSON.description: Converts structured data to a JSON string.
json:TransformToJSON.notes: Requires a data structure definition. Mapper fields vary by data structure.

json:AggregateToJSON.label: Aggregate to JSON
json:AggregateToJSON.description: Combines multiple bundles into a single JSON array.
json:AggregateToJSON.notes: Feeder param references the source module ID producing bundles.

util:SetVariable.label: Set Variable
util:SetVariable.description: Sets a single variable accessible by downstream modules.
util:SetVariable.notes: Variable accessible via {{moduleId.value}} in downstream modules.

util:SetMultipleVariables.label: Set Multiple Variables
util:SetMultipleVariables.description: Sets multiple variables at once. Each accessible downstream.
util:SetMultipleVariables.notes: Variables is an array of {name, value} pairs.

google-sheets:addRow.label: Add a Row
google-sheets:addRow.description: Appends a row to a Google Sheet.
google-sheets:addRow.notes: spreadsheetId and sheetId should use placeholders if not known. Values is an array of cell values.

google-sheets:getRow.label: Get a Row
google-sheets:getRow.description: Retrieves a specific row from a Google Sheet.
google-sheets:getRow.notes: Row value can be a number or a data mapping expression.

google-sheets:updateRow.label: Update a Row
google-sheets:updateRow.description: Updates an existing row in a Google Sheet.
google-sheets:updateRow.notes: Row identifies which row to update. Values is an array of cell values.

slack:PostMessage.label: Post a Message
slack:PostMessage.description: Posts a message to a Slack channel.
slack:PostMessage.notes: Channel can be a channel name (e.g., #general) or channel ID.

gateway:WebhookResponse.label: Webhook Response
gateway:WebhookResponse.description: Sends HTTP response back to the webhook caller.
gateway:WebhookResponse.notes: Only valid in scenarios with a webhook trigger. Status is HTTP status code.
